competitors.name: Palantir Technologies
competitors.notes: Heavyweight in enterprise analytics and AI, significantly larger than C3.ai, Gotham for government, Foundry and AIP for commercial

competitors.name: IBM Watson
competitors.notes: Major enterprise AI competitor vying for market share

competitors.name: Microsoft Azure AI
competitors.notes: Cloud AI platform competitor, C3.ai is most sought-after AI app on Azure marketplace

competitors.name: Google Cloud AI
competitors.notes: Enterprise AI platform, C3.ai has alliance with Google Cloud

competitors.name: Databricks
competitors.notes: Unified data analytics platform, focuses on data centralization vs C3.ai's enterprise AI applications

competitors.name: DataRobot
competitors.notes: Enterprise AI platform competitor for automated machine learning

competitors.name: Domino Data Lab
competitors.notes: Enterprise AI platform for building, deploying, and managing AI models

competitors.name: Altair AI Studio
competitors.notes: Best C3 AI Suite alternative for AI/ML development

context: In 2024, C3.ai competes in the enterprise AI platform market against cloud hyperscalers (Microsoft Azure AI, Google Cloud AI), specialized AI platforms (Palantir, DataRobot, Databricks), and enterprise software vendors (IBM, Salesforce). The company reported net loss of $280M for fiscal 2024, raising financial sustainability questions. C3.ai's price-to-sales ratio of 10.5 is lower than peers Palantir and Snowflake. 40% of C3.ai deals focus on manufacturing and defense. The company announced expanded Microsoft alliance in late 2024, closing 28 new deals through joint engagements across nine industries. C3.ai remains the most sought-after AI application on Microsoft's Azure marketplace.
